transArray.content: Cleanliness and sanitary services are very good. There are also free parking spaces. There is also a dedicated office area. Very suitable for business trips.

Hello dear guest! Thank you for choosing to stay at Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel and for your recognition of the hotel's environment and services. Your satisfaction is the driving force for our progress. Thank you very much for your review and support. The hotel is located in the Badali Automobile Park on the Fourth Ring Road, close to the park. There are plenty of shared parking spaces. When leaving the hotel, you only need to pick up an electronic parking coupon at the front desk to park for free. Public transportation is accessible in all directions around the hotel. The lobby and laundry room have been newly upgraded, and there are office areas and reception areas to meet your business travel needs. For all your needs, all the hotel staff look forward to your every patronage and wish you success in your work! General Manager: Zhang Xiangyun
